[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::setup()] [Key Generation] Does setup() use cryptographically secure RNG (OsRng) for test key generation, or predictable RNG? Low severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::setup_with_timeouts()] [Timeout Configuration] Can test timeouts be configured to zero Duration, breaking timeout logic? Low severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::run_dkg()] [DKG Validation] Does run_dkg() verify that aggregate_public_key matches sum of polynomial commitments? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::run_sign()] [Signature Verification] Does run_sign() verify signatures against correct public key for all signature types? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::verify_packet_sigs] [Auth Testing] Does verify_packet_sigs test cover coordinator key removal during active rounds? Medium severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::check_signature_shares()] [Bad Share Detection] Does check_signature_shares test verify that all bad parties are correctly identified? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::gen_nonces()] [Nonce Uniqueness] Does gen_nonces test verify nonces are different even when signing same message multiple times? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::bad_signature_share_request()] [Edge Cases] Does bad_signature_share_request test empty nonces, duplicate nonces, and out-of-range signer_ids? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::invalid_nonce()] [Nonce Validation] Does invalid_nonce test cover both zero points and generator point G? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::empty_public_shares()] [DKG Failure] Does empty_public_shares test verify correct failure detection and malicious signer identification? Medium severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [test::empty_private_shares()] [Missing Shares] Does empty_private_shares test handle case where some signers send empty shares while others don't? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [mod frost] [Implementation Divergence] Can frost and fire coordinators have different security properties for same Config? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [mod fire] [Timeout Handling] Does fire coordinator timeout logic correctly mark signers as malicious without false positives? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [submodules] [State Machine Consistency] Do frost and fire coordinators implement state machine transitions identically? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [submodules] [Error Handling] Can errors from frost/fire coordinators bypass trait-level error handling? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [ID Validation] Do implementations validate that dkg_id/sign_id in received messages match current round IDs? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Duplicate Detection] Do implementations properly reject duplicate messages from same signer_id? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Key ID Validation] Do implementations verify received key_ids match configured signer_key_ids? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Public Key Presence] Do implementations check signer_id exists in public_keys.signers before processing? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Nonce Validation] Do implementations validate nonces are non-zero and not equal to generator G? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Packet Signature] When verify_packet_sigs is true, do implementations always verify before any other processing? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Coordinator Key] Is coordinator_public_key required to be set when verify_packet_sigs is enabled? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Aggregator Init] Do implementations call aggregator.init() with validated party_polynomials before signing? Critical severity.
